none: Mitchell, S. Augustus (Samuel Augustus), 1792-1868. New universal atlas. Philadelphia : S. Augustus Mitchell, 1847. [No.] 5

Scale [ca. 1:8,000,000] (W 97°--W 67°/N 50°--N 24°) ; Relief shown by hachures.; Prime meridian: Washington.; Shows the eastern United States as far west as Louisiana and Minnesota.; Plate no. 5.; "Entered according to the act of Congress in the year 1846, by H.N. Burroughs in the ... District Court for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania."; Appeared in the author's New universal atlas. Philadelphia: S. Augustus Mitchell, 1847.
